name: Heart Attack - GDKO 2023 - Round 3
description:
There are many hero's fighting the evils of the world. One of them is sir captain Philip J Locus, whos father William was lost in space for most of his life. He goes around the galaxy fighting the biggest baddest monsters he can find. But for a recent outing he underestimated truly how big his opponent was and before he could do anything the monster swallowed him whole. Now trapped in the beasts stomach Philip must fight his way out by fighting the beasts internal organs. 

Controls:

A/D - Left/Right
W/Space - Jump
Left Click / Hold Left click - Shoot

Credits:
all assets made by me accept the music which I got from free sound.org
